text: 16.58 Drive-through takeaway businesses encourage the use of private vehicles and create unfriendly and in some cases unsafe pedestrian and cycle environments. Therefore, new drive-through takeaways will not be supported, and the council will generally support schemes that propose to redevelop existing drive-through takeaways where they accord with other relevant policies. 16.59 Food businesses where all, or a significant proportion, of the business is via delivery can have a significant impact on the public realm and on the amenity of surrounding occupiers. This includes both ‘dark kitchens’ – food businesses that cater only to delivery customers, and traditional restaurants and takeaways with a high level of delivery business.
